name: SocialOptic
overview:
The brains behind Milestone Planner, SocialOptic use the technologies and philosophy that built social media to create web-based tools that make for better managed, more productive businesses.

Milestone Planner is the flagship product, taking a social approach to project management, focussing teams on what needs doing, when. The product’s capabilities make it easy to see if a project is going off course and why, and complement other on-line collaboration tools that tend to me more focussed on meetings and documents, rather than goals and long-term progress.
